title: Strictly's Motsi Mabuse's dramatic Halloween eye makeup scores high with viewers

Strictly Come Dancing viewers were delighted by judge Motsi Mabuse's spooky Halloween makeup in tonight's show.

The judge rocked a gothic look to match the occasion, which saw the couples dance Halloween themed numbers.

Motsi wore dramatic black eye makeup with sparkly eyeliner flicks on the outer corners and underneath her eye, and enormous false eyelashes.

She paired this with black lipstick and she wore a bright yellow wig with a dangerous-looking hat that looked like a pin cushion.

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

"Motsi Mabuse's makeup is insane this evening", declared one viewer.

"Honestly the makeup department has outdone themselves with the judges! Craigs mascara is killer Motsi looks amazing", added another.

"Once again, @MOTSI_MABUSE ’s eye makeup is amazing!", said a third.

(Image: BBC)

Others raved: "Motsi Mabuse is so stunning! Her makeup is always so on point and creative" and "love Motsi’s makeup - she looks amazing."

Motsi's makeup artist posted about the look, and an excited viewer responded: "She looks INSANE! You've surpassed yourself this week. Everyone looks amazing!"

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

Meanwhile Craig Revel Horwood sported a dramatic smokey eye, which viewers got on board with.

"Craig's eye make up is on point", said one, while another wrote:

"craig looks so good in that costume and makeup" said another.

"Just watching strictly and seeing craig revel horwood in black eyeshadow like wow he looks great", said a third.
description: Motsi Mabuse looked fabulously gothic in black makeup and a bright yellow wig in tonight's Strictly Come Dancing
